snippet.title: Ex Astris Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Go through the storm, transcend eternity. Dear traveler, enjoy your journey.
Ex Astris, the first Premium game presented by Hypergryph,
reveals an exploration of episodic narrative and 3D RPG gameplay.

↓↓Check out our official website for more information↓↓
Ex Astris official website：exa.hypergryph.com/en
